segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, everything seems so everyday.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing a dish, apron on, expression calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink frames a tidy garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line a path, fence in the distance, all serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the sink's faucet is pouring water nonstop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing, sheet of water down the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor, her foot immersed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't reacted, still fixated on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the two-step stool reaches for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's tilted, he holds a plate while grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands ready, hand outstretched expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating this cookie heist quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amusing how they're pulling it off right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup is full of unnoticed little dramas.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at the innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR
